General.Name: StavropolEnergoSbyt
General.Description: Publichnoye aktsionernoye obshchestvo Stavropol'energosbyt supplies electricity in the Stavropol territory, Russia. It is also involved in the production of steam and hot water. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Essentuki, Russia.

1.Name: Oksana Mikhaylovna Griva
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Director - Director for Economics & Fin.
